components.name: Tizen
components.description: HTML5 os for phones tablets, IVI

fields.description:
h5.Description
Creating a Tizen project works as expected, and building the project also works.
However, installing the application fails and gives no reason why it does.

h5.Steps To Reproduce
1. Build a Tizen project in studio
2. Run the project on Tizen simulator or device

h5.Expected Result
The project should be installed on the device and should run as expected.

h5.Actual Result
The project builds successfully, then stops running and gives no output.

+Extra Information+
Log file has been added to show studios attempt at installing.
fields.summary: Tizen: Project fails to install onto phone or simulator
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201310300119
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131029150357
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.2.2
Tizen SDK: 2.2.0
Tizen Simulator: 2.2.0
Tizen Device: Samsung Z900S 2.2.0

comments.body:
Verified fixed on:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311140721
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131113183932
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.3.0
Tizen SDK: 2.2.1
Tizen Simulator: 2.2.1
Tizen Device: Samsung Z900S 2.2.0

I updated my Tizen SDK to the latest build and created a new keystore using this SDK.
Setting up Appcelerator Studio with this new SDK and Keystore seemed to fix this issue.
This works through Studio.
